resources.string:
FindMyDevice (FMD) is an application that can help you find your phone when it gets lost.
It uses SMS (texting) to communicate and send commands from a second device so you can track your phone.
Just send a SMS message that contains the "fmd" command.
Please note that this application is still in beta.

 - Nulide
Some new permissions are needed.\nPlease check the following permissions in order to continue using this application, or change back to an older version.

In order to command the phone to do something, this application needs to be able to see your SMS messages. Your messages never leave your phone, and they are never used for anything except finding your phone.\nThis Permission is needed.
Not everybody is allowed to send commands to your phone, so you need to select some contacts who will be able to locate your device.\nThis permission is needed.

If you want to get the GPS coordinates from your phone, the application needs this permission. \nPlease also allow the application to locate your phone in the background.\nIf you don\'t give this permission, this functionality will not be activated.

You also can make your phone ring to help you locate it. When \"Do Not Disturb\" is active, it may be possible that the phone is muted.\nIf you don\'t give this permission, this functionality will not be activated.
If you want to lock or wipe your phone if it gets lost, this permission is needed.\nIf you don\'t give this permission, this functionality will not be activated.

This application is capable of turning on location if you normally leave location off.
If it is off, "fmd locate" will not work.
In order to achieve this, the application needs a special permission that you have to grant using a computer.
If you don't give this permission, it's no problem.
You can still use this application.
When you remotely lock your device, this application can show a message on the lockscreen for whoever finds your phone.\nIf you don\'t give this permission, this functionality will not be activated.
FindMyDevice\nThis phone is locked!\nMessage from the owner:

Thank you for downloading this app!
There is still a lot to do, but I hope this app will help you if you find yourself in the same situation I had. Losing your phone is bad, but losing your phone because there are no privacy-friendly apps to help you find it is even worse.
Contributions and donations are welcome! Just go to F-Droid and search for my app.

 - Nulide

OpenCellID
OpenStreetMap
Used as confirmation before wiping the device or for temporary usage of the service.
Lock Screen Message:\nWhen locking the device, this message will appear on the lock screen.
The command used to communicate with the FindMyDevice application.
The permissions needed for certain features
Please add the country code (Landcode) to the number. (Like "+49", "+44", ...)
GPS coordinates will be sent soon.
" locate - sends the current location of the phone"
Allows you to communicate with FMD via a pin. You will be added to a temporary Whitelist.
Here you can add your contacts to the whitelist. Whitelisted contacts will be able to send commands to your phone using SMS.

Congratulations. You have added your first contact. You can now communicate with FMD by sending a SMS message that contains \"fmd\" from the whitelisted phone number. When everything works, the application will respond.
Notification about the Lifecycle of the Service.
Error gaining location from OpenCellID. Please try the following the link. The parameters you want are \"lon\" and \"lat\".
Empty Command not allowed\n Returning to default.[fmd]
Select a ringtone that will be played when "fmd ring" is sent.
Select one of the phone numbers.
By enabling, the application will constantly send your location to the specified server.
The URL for accessing the server.
The time in minutes in which FMD should send new location data to the server.
The ID you need to search for the Device.\n\nWill be shown once ServerSettings are filled and password is set.

Here you can configure the application to communicate with FMDserver. If you want to configure a different server than default, you can do so by changing the URL. If you press "register" you can register the application to the server. Afterwards you can enable the server functionality. If you do so, your phone will send you location data to the specified server. You can check your phone\'s location by entering the ID and the password on the page.
Please select what location data to send to the server. (One needs to be selected)
" GPS (on/off) - turns the GPS on or off."
Sorry the application is not allowed to do so.
" expert - help page for expert commands."
If you want FMD to handle messages from other applications such as Telegram, Whatsapp, etc., you can give FMD access to notifications.
Display notifications sent from the server.
When the location is requested by SMS or any other future method, the location can also be transmitted to the server if this option is enabled.
This will delete all data from the Server! Are you sure?
Send your phone\'s location when the device boots up.
" Sound (on/off) - turns the sound on or off."
" Camera (front/back) - takes a picture and sends it to FMDserver."
Notification for specific services that will run in the background. Like camera, ...
If you want to remotely receive pictures from your phone, the camera permission is needed.
"The device will soon send a picture to fmdserver. You can view it here soon: "
Send the location of this device when the battery level goes low. (This requires Notification Access)
